Activities commonly implemented under this intervention

Develop integrated land management approaches to restore and maintain rangeland and pasture productivity.
Build capacity in natural resource management planning at community and local levels.
Develop water resources and distribution in underexploited rangelands.

Guidance for increased animal health sustainability

P5. Consider a One Health initiative when developing the integrated management approach.
P2. Promote good biosecurity practices when access to drinking facilities and avoid (when possible) mixing herds to reduce the risk of animal diseases transmission
P2. All surveillance strategies should be risk-based.
